title: The citadel of chaos epub
description:
I decided to take on the challenge of taking a bad pdf Scan and turn it into a bearable reading book.

Seriously, after all these years we can only get a bad PDF scan of these awesome Fighting Fantasy books? And some of them were 2 page semi-diagonal scans?

No. I decided to start a project to give new life to these awesome books, keeping  the original format (paragraph range on top , paragraph and quote on the images).

I took a semi-good OCR, gave a text review, re-added the italics, caps, images...

Well, you get the idea.

I know it's not ideal or perfect, but at least, it's a starting point. If you want to, you can change, add css to make the html bearable... I simply have no patience for making Css.
